markdownRemark.html:
My opinion on this is it depends. Okay now you have your answer and get the F out of here - Ooooor read further and maybe you’ll realize if college is right choice for you or not.

For me - it was not worth it.

frontmatter.title: So I got Master's degree - Is it worth it?
